communications.subject: Indiana Access to Public Records Act Request: Indiana University Bloomington
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. A list of members belonging to the Indiana University Bloomington "Ad Hoc Committee" that met on April 24, 2024, resulting in approval of a new regulation governing the temporary or permanent installation of structures, as referenced on the Office of Student Life website. 
2. Any written records, including agendas, draft statements, roll-call votes, or meeting minutes, pertaining to the April 24 meeting and retained by members of the Ad Hoc Committee. 
3. Any communications, including text messages, sent or received by the following individuals on April 23, 24, 25, 26 or 27 that pertain to demonstrations on Dunn Meadow over the same period. 
	a. Members of the Ad Hoc Committee
	b. President Pamela Whitten
	c. Provost Rahul Shrivastav

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Rebecca Burns
